name: Annoying Crow
text: Decent place caw caw. ordered the Tuscan Six Cheese but it just tastes like a regular cheese pizza caw caw. Customer service was very good but the price is quite high caw caw.

name: Virginia Monaghan
text: First time coming here, and the employees were very polite and helpful. Once we made our decision the food was prepared quickly and was good.

name: Jon
text: Fast delivery, freash pizza and garlic knots!!! Vary happy with the pricing and loved the garlic dipping sauce for the üçï. A-

name: Michael Johnson
text: This place has been fantastic every step of the way, every time I've gotten food here. Not only did they deliver to my college (technically outside their delivery range), the staff was extremely polite, clear in their speech, and helpful ‚Ä¶More

name: Edward Davis
text: So far I have never had a bad experience.  They even have utensils and napkins.  Pizza is always cooked thoroughly compared to other pizza places.

name: Lovelyone
text: My family love Papa John ‚Äòs pizza but their service needs improvement. I was there on Monday afternoon the man there taking the order have no customer service, no greeting when we walk in the store or greeting when we left the store . He ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Melton
text:

Delicious food reasonable prices

name: Brandon Chafin
text: Food is terrible. Employees extremely rude. Very dirty establishment. Go to Walmart and buy a digiorno, you will be much better off no joke.

name: Shirley Rice
text: Great pizza delivery is always fast I like my pizza  hot im impressed! Finally a pizza place that can deliver on time! They are under new management now way better! Give them a try again you won't regret it!

name: Jason Wood
text: Pizzas just ok at this location Vestal's branch taste better

name: daina Gonzalez
text: First timer. Fresh ingredients. Fresh out of the oven. But the BBQ sauce is a little sweet for my taste. Overall good food.

name: Amber Fisher
text: I've recently learned this location is under new ownership and management, and my family tried the pizza again. Glad we did! Delivery was very quick and our pizza and cheesy bread were delicious! Will order again!

name: Bruce B
text: Great pizza great specials friendly staff

name: James Dixon
text: Best pizza place they deliever very fast and is very polite i order twice a week because i enjoy the service that they provide.

name: Mr. Ruiz
text: Pizza Is Ok For A Pizza Chain Restaraunt

name: Patrick Mohan
text: The lady made us stand in the freezing cold to prove to her that we had used the college meal deal. Worst customer service I've ever experienced.

name: Adnan C
text: Recently placed an order it took over 1 hour to deliver , pizza was sloopy, undercooked  crust,  delivery driver was not professional at all

text: was not pleased, not what i was expecting it to be. too expensive, not too many good deals to choose from & pizza has a similar taste to little Caesars.
